dcterms:creator: A. Klautau
P. Batista
N. González-Prelcic
Y. Wang
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: The Raymobtime dataset contains synthetic data for LIDAR and position-aided mmWave beam selection in a V2I communication scenario, generated using various simulators including tools for transforming satellite images into realistic 3D urban scenes, mobility simulator for generating traffic data, and tools for generating ray-tracing mmWave channels.
dcterms:title: Raymobtime dataset

dcterms:creator: A. Klautau
P. Batista
N. González-Prelcic
Y. Wang
R. W. Heath
dcterms:description: The Raymobtime dataset provides data for machine learning applications in 5G MIMO, specifically for beam-selection using deep learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Raymobtime dataset
